case.title: Fancy a paid date tonight? Call girl fantasy? (C.London)
case.text:
Ever dreamed about being naughty and becoming a call girl just for one night?
Being told how to dress, where to come and your required behaviour....the excitement and nerves mixed together as you come ring the door bell (or arrive at the venue if we meet outside).
All light hearted and fun, a relaxed evening, starting with drinks and dinner and building slowly from there.
IF interested get in touch and be sure to include all the following:
1) your email address 2) a brief brief description of yourself 3) a photo (must if you would like a reply- it weeds out the timewasters!) 4) some info like your age, where you are from, etc.
Ill reply with more information and a photo!
